text: Dylan Mavin is an Australian motorcycle racer. In 2008 and 2009 he was a competitor in the Red Bull MotoGP Rookies Cup racing series. ==Grand Prix motorcycle racing== ===By season=== {|class="wikitable" !Season !Class !Motorcycle !Team !Number !Race !Win !Podium !Pole !FLap !Pts !Plcd |- align="right" ! | 125cc | Honda | Mavin Industries | 30 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | |- align="right" !
